{% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Imports

{% raw %} 
from gensim.models import Word2Vec
{% endraw %}

Pre-processing

{% raw %}

class Corpus[source]

Corpus()

An iterator that yields sentences (lists of str).

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
sents = Corpus()
{% endraw %}

Train embeddings

{% raw %} 
model = Word2Vec(
    sents, 
    min_count=1,
    size= 50,
    workers=3, 
    window =3, 
    sg = 1
)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
model.wv['basketball'].shape

(50,)
{% endraw %}

Evaluate embeddings

{% raw %} 
for index, word in enumerate(model.wv.index2word):
    if index == 10:
        break
    print(f"word #{index}/{len(model.wv.index2word)} is {word}")

word #0/9 is like
word #1/9 is and
word #2/9 is I
word #3/9 is playing
word #4/9 is basketball
word #5/9 is tennis
word #6/9 is You
word #7/9 is reading
word #8/9 is writing
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
model.wv.similarity('basketball', 'tennis')

0.24733709
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
model.wv.similarity('basketball', 'I')

-0.17399852
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
model.wv.most_similar('basketball')[:10]

[('tennis', 0.24733713269233704),
 ('writing', 0.09569855779409409),
 ('reading', 0.013453084975481033),
 ('playing', -0.029057681560516357),
 ('You', -0.07019157707691193),
 ('I', -0.17399850487709045),
 ('and', -0.2035938799381256),
 ('like', -0.29376399517059326)]
{% endraw %}
